body.bibl: Kominko, Maja. “Beyond Empire: Kosmas Indikopleustes, the Church of the East and the Indian Trade in the Sixth Century AD.” In Egypt and Empire: The Formation of Religious Identity after Rome, edited by Elisabeth R. O’Connell, 173–97. British Museum Publications on Egypt and Sudan 11. Leuven: Peeters, 2022.
